Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Wahibra-... with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, crossed hands in relief holding an incised adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket which hangs over the shoulder, the front of the leg-section is inscribed with a column of incised hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet(damaged).
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
